message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_SCREENINGTYPEID
message.locale: Screening ID is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_RELATEDID
message.locale: Related ID is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_RELATEDRELATEDTYPE
message.locale: Related Type is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_XRV_LINK_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The Program Item %1s has already been added to this Screening.

message.name: ERR_XRV_FINAL_PROGRAM
message.locale: At least one Program must exist for any Screening which is currently associated with an Online Category.
